articles.description: Angelina Jolie has been slammed as 'vindictive' and guilty of 'systematic obstruction', in a new lawsuit brought against her on behalf of ex-husband Brad Pitt, DailyMail.com can reveal.
articles.content:
Angelina Jolie has been slammed as 'vindictive' and guilty of 'systematic obstruction' in a new lawsuit brought against her on behalf of Brad Pitt, DailyMail.com can reveal.
